CallGear Softphone is a communication app that allows you to make calls directly from the browser, without using specific hardware or additional programs.

Now a full-fledged softphone for calls is available on the page of the service or website you need. When logging in to the extension, the softphone icon is loaded onto the page: you can collapse it or open it at any time by clicking. 

The extension supports the ClicktoCall functionality. It finds phone numbers on the site and helps to make a seamless call by clicking on the phone number.

The extension works only if you have a valid CallGear account.

More than 10,000 companies use CallGear to interact with customers.
Our clients are businesses of various sizes and directions, including leaders in their market segments. We are chosen for our quality and caring attitude towards each customer.
